On Apr 7, 2010, at 5:53 PM, wahbedahbe wrote:

> So I disagree that application design is all client side -- both the client and the servers (most importantly the representations they serve) are important to achieving the users' goals.

Yes, that sounds better, I agree. Thanks.

Jan
